text: Václav Pavkovič (24 April 1936 – 17 November 2019) was a Czech rower. He competed for Czechoslovakia in the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born in Břeclav. In 1960, he was a crew member of the Czechoslovak boat which won the bronze medal in the eights event. He died 17 November 2019, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * profile Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Rowers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Czech Republic Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Czechoslovakia
title: Václav Pavkovič
